response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to both parties. Given its worth to you, we believe it's important to offer a fair deal. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This price reflects the significant value the product holds for you while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. We understand that this might be your first choice, and we hope to secure your agreement on this matter. Should you have any concerns or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
